channel.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)
channel.description:
I know I may be considered a heart less idiot for saying this, but is all this publicity [b][i]really[/i][/b] neccassery?
I don't understand why Ronaldo, Beckham and Lampard are pleeing for her return. I've had a friend who went missing for 2 weeks, not one mention in the newspapers, let alone millionaires pleeing for his return.
Another thing, why are the parents asking for yellow arm bands to be worn today? It's just stupid, and it's annoying me. To me, it just looks like the parents are begging for some international attention. Get on with it instead of making people wear yellow arm bands.
Opinions?

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

Apparently they knew where she was but the police were to late to react… Doesn’t sound likely to me…

[quote=“yakman, post:6, topic:93067”]well they say stuff like ‘we belive she is still alive’
where do they get that from? im guessing she is up for ransom,

iv heard its very rare for kidnap victims to live past 1 day of being kidnapped, its my assumsion that she is ether dead, or being ransomed[/quote]

It’s sad, but I really don’t think they will find her alive.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:6, topic:93067”]well they say stuff like ‘we belive she is still alive’
where do they get that from? im guessing she is up for ransom,

iv heard its very rare for kidnap victims to live past 1 day of being kidnapped, its my assumsion that she is ether dead, or being ransomed[/quote]

What about that retard kid who was “brainwashed”

The reason it is so publicised is because she was practically stolen out of her parents arms, and that it could easily happen to any of us.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

moparscape424:

its the parents and her fault she should of screamed and it dont really matter its annoying me cos all thats on the tv is maddy maddy maddy

Maybe he threatened to kill her if she screamed… she was 4 for god sake, she’ll believe anything. But thwen again if he threatened to kill her he was probably not even joking.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:6, topic:93067”]well they say stuff like ‘we belive she is still alive’
where do they get that from? im guessing she is up for ransom,

iv heard its very rare for kidnap victims to live past 1 day of being kidnapped, its my assumsion that she is ether dead, or being ransomed[/quote]

If she was ransomed, I’m sure they would have asked for something by now. I reckon she’s dead.

Its extremely sad to see, and hear, that someone has lost their son/daughter in another country, but i do believe that the media and celebs are hyping it up hugely which i dont like

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

She’s dead. Why would the kidnapper want her to go telling people what he looked like?

The footballers are just doing it to get publicity. The parents are just worried.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)

item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

when i heard david beckham on the radio, i couldnt belive it. If people think it is right that a celeberity should be involved in making a crime case over publicized, and possiblew affecting the case in an unknown way, they need help

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

No, I disagree. I think if you felt how they felt about losing their daughter in a foreign country you would understand, besides the more people that hear about it, the more help they will get in (hopefully) finding their daughter.

The media is making a bit of a mess of things though, with all these rumors about sightings of her etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Missing Madeline (sp?)

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

its gay… lol this time about a year and a half ago i walked out of school… and went home … and then came back the next day and no body even noticed that i went :S
But yeah more on topic… seems most people are just trying to get publicity through this girl

Read full topic
